nars.util.graph

Class DerivationTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapht.graph.AbstractGraph<V,E>
      • org.jgrapht.graph.AbstractBaseGraph<V,E>
        • org.jgrapht.graph.DirectedMultigraph<Task,java.lang.String>
          • nars.util.graph.DerivationTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, org.jgrapht.DirectedGraph<Task,java.lang.String>, org.jgrapht.Graph<Task,java.lang.String>

    public class DerivationTree
extends org.jgrapht.graph.DirectedMultigraph<Task,java.lang.String>
    Generates a set of trees (forest) for derivations of a set of Tasks. These incude all known tasks forming the premises of the ancestry of the target task.
    See Also:
